attributes.action: accept that the population has lost confidence in this government and resign.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the latest misgivings about the home office and illegal immigrants, the crisis at Northern Rock, the fiasco at HMRC with lost data disks and the current misgivings over the government's compliance with the Political Parties, Elections and Referendum Act 2000, it's time for the prime minister to accept that the only way for confidence to be restored in the political system is for him to resign and allow a general election.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
